title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from table inside a grid cell
OB: When attempting to export data from a table inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: When exporting data from two tables, the expected result is that the data is successfully exported. However, the actual result is that an exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Insert a grid. 2. Export data from the table inside a grid cell.
